txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the citizens to fall</rgb>
Defeat the forces of Mordor that have overtaken part of the wall of Minas Tirith before they can use Gondor's own siege equipment against it.
Defeat the siege-leader and his forces on the captured wall

Forces of Mordor have overtaken part of the outer wall of Minas Tirith and intend to use Gondor's own siege weaponry against the inhabitants of the city.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat the siege-leader atop his tower
* Defeat the Orkish forces on the wall
* Prevent the Orcs from destroying siege equipment
* Destroy enemy barricades
